description:
Mozilla Thunderbird 135 open-source email client is now available for download with XZ packaging for Linux binaries and other changes. Here's what's new!

The post Mozilla Thunderbird 135 Released with XZ Packaging for Linux Binaries appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Mozilla Thunderbird 135 Released with XZ Packaging for Linux Binaries

description:
Firefox 136 open-source web browser is now available for public beta testing with hardware video decoding for AMD GPUs on Linux and many other changes. Here’s what to expect!

The post Firefox 136 Promises Hardware Video Decoding for AMD GPUs on Linux, Vertical Tabs appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Firefox 136 Promises Hardware Video Decoding for AMD GPUs on Linux, Vertical Tabs
